Get a quote for buying or selling any ERC20 token

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"apiKey","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Your Public API key."},{"name":"sellToken","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The ERC20 token address of the token you want to sell."},{"name":"buyToken","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The ERC20 token address of the token you want to receive."},{"name":"sellAmount","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The amount of sellToken (in sellToken base units) you want to send."},{"name":"buyAmount","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The amount of buyToken (in buyToken base units) you want to receive."},{"name":"slippagePercentage","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The maximum acceptable slippage percentage."},{"name":"gasPrice","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The target gas price for the swap transaction."},{"name":"takerAddress","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The address which will fill the quote."},{"name":"excludedSources","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Liquidity sources to exclude from the quote."},{"name":"includedSources","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Liquidity sources to include in the quote."},{"name":"skipValidation","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"description":"Skip validation of the quote."},{"name":"feeRecipient","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The address that should receive affiliate fees."},{"name":"buyTokenPercentageFee","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The percentage of the buyAmount attributed as affiliate fees."},{"name":"enableSlippageProtection","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"description":"Enable slippage protection."},{"name":"priceImpactProtectionPercentage","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Allowed price impact percentage."},{"name":"feeRecipientTradeSurplus","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The recipient address of any trade surplus fees."},{"name":"shouldSellEntireBalance","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"description":"Sell the entirety of the caller's takerToken balance."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
